lessons.title: Introduction to Mobile Data Storage
lessons.description: Explore the fundamental concepts of data storage in mobile applications, including the differences between local and remote storage. Understand the importance of data persistence and how it impacts user experience and application performance.

lessons.title: Local Databases: SQLite vs. Core Data
lessons.description: Dive into local database options for iOS applications, focusing on SQLite and Core Data. Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each, their use cases, and best practices for implementing them in mobile applications.

Learn strategies for designing scalable data storage solutions in mobile applications. This lesson covers data modeling, normalization, and denormalization techniques, as well as considerations for future growth and performance.
lessons.title: Designing Scalable Data Storage Solutions
Implementing Real-time Data Synchronization
lessons.description: Understand the principles of real-time data synchronization between mobile applications and backend servers. Learn about WebSockets, Firebase, and other technologies that enable real-time data updates.

lessons.title: Handling Data Conflicts in Synchronization
lessons.description: Examine common data conflict scenarios that arise during synchronization and explore strategies for conflict resolution. This lesson covers techniques such as last-write-wins, versioning, and user intervention.

Discover best practices for implementing offline data storage in mobile applications. Learn about caching strategies, data queuing, and how to ensure data consistency when the device goes offline and comes back online.
lessons.title: Offline Data Storage Strategies
Choosing the Right Data Storage Solution
lessons.description: Explore various data storage options available for mobile applications, including cloud storage, local storage, and hybrid approaches. Learn how to evaluate and select the right storage solution based on application requirements.

lessons.title: Performance Optimization for Data Storage
lessons.description: Learn techniques for optimizing data storage performance in mobile applications. This lesson covers indexing, query optimization, and the impact of data structure choices on application speed and responsiveness.

Understand the security implications of storing data in mobile applications. Learn about encryption, secure data storage practices, and how to protect sensitive user information from unauthorized access.
lessons.title: Security Considerations in Data Storage
Data Migration Strategies
lessons.description: Explore strategies for migrating data between different storage solutions or from legacy systems to newer architectures. Learn about challenges, tools, and best practices to ensure a seamless data migration process.

lessons.title: User Experience and Data Management
lessons.description: Examine the relationship between data management and user experience in mobile applications. Learn how to design data workflows that enhance usability while maintaining data integrity and performance.

description: Strategies for designing scalable data storage, local databases, and real-time synchronization with backend servers for mobile applications.
title: Mobile System Design: Data Storage and Synchronization
